name: Little Red Hood (jinxedbyte)
description:
Contribution to Trijam #127 - Things are getting weird

Controls:

  • Down Arrow - Go Down
  • Right Arrow - Shoot Toast

Gameplay:

  • Hit the Toaster to score
  • Do not hit the wolf while awake
  • Avoid the enemies

Assets used:

  • My own creations in Aseprite
  • 1BIT Canari Pack Top Down - Tileset
  • Did not have time to integrate any music or sfx, sorry

Let me know your highscore in the comments.
